title: Three Bedroom Apartment for Sale
location: Prime Residencies - Libra, Denzil Kobbekaduwa Mw, Battaramulla
details:
Brand new, three bedroom apartment for sale at Prime Residencies, Battaramulla. Conveniently located on Denzil Kobbekaduwa Mawatha, only 1.5 km from Battaramulla Junction & 2 km from Waters Edge. The apartment offers generous living space along with a total of three bedrooms and two bathrooms.

The apartment features a spacious living and dining area along with a fully fitted pantry. The master bedroom is well designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom. The apartment benefits from a wide range of shared facilities and amenities which include a swimming pool, gym, function room, roof top terrace, secure covered parking garage, central garbage collecting point and 24 hour security.

- Three bedrooms, two bathrooms.
- Both bathrooms equipped with electric hot water.
- Provision for AC in living area and bedrooms.
- Spacious living and dining area with outdoor terrace.
- Fitted pantry cupboards with provision for oven, cooker & fridge.
- Maids room & bathroom.
- Separate utility/laundry area.
- Covered parking reserved for one vehicle.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
